name: YuleTown
description:
The first game by Team Scrungy! Made as part of HPS1's Madvent collection 2022.

Welcome to YuleTown! You move into a strange little town in the middle of snowy nowhere, and it appears to be populated by Yule legends from all around Europe. The trouble is, you have to get everyone a present for Christmas, and Christmas is tomorrow!! 

Wander the town, get to know your new neighbours, help them out, and maybe you won't get eaten by Krampus the next day...

-----

Controls:

WASD to move

look around with mouse

E to interact/talk/continue dialogue

P to check Inventory

-----

In this Christmas adventure, you will meet:
  • Mari Lwyd- the singing ghost horse, a tradition in Wales. She goes door to door, and if she out-sings you, she will drink all of your alcohol
  • Saint Nick and Krampus- We all know them, but did you know they are sometimes portrayed working together? so that is implying Santa sees Krampus eating children and is just like, cool with it.  messed up.
  • Saint Lucy- a saint commonly celebrated with candles and songs in Scandinavian countries. She is often depicted holding a plate with her eyes on it.
  • Yule lads- 13 troll like characters who often get up to mischief and stealing, of Icelandic origin.
  • Schnabelperchten- a strange bird like old lady creature who goes to each house to check if its clean. If it isn't, she'll cut your head off with her large shears! Originated from Austria.
  • Jack Frost- He's a mischievous spirit who brings the cold into winter. He also likes to paint the pretty fractal patterns into the ice. 
  • Julbocken- Yule goat, he is...a goat. In Scandinavian countries, a straw goat is burned to celebrate.
  • Yule cat- An enormous cat that is the pet of the Yule lads.
  • Tio de Nadal- A festive log with a happy face. Traditional character from Spain. It poops out gifts.
  • Baba Yaga- the russian witch of the forest. Her house has chicken legs and walks around and is really cool. She is sometimes said to hunt naughty children and steal their presents.

-----

Warnings:

the game is mostly harmless, but has bad language and a bit of edge to its humour. Its silly and childish humour, but it is not for kids.

music is a bit loud at some parts (sry lol)

-----

Thank you for your interest in our silly game! We hope you enjoy it! We are new to making games, but we will be making more because we had a lot of fun making Yuletown! If you would like to see more content, check out our socials! <3

-Team Scrungy.
